Thread: Why Litecoin was one of my first crypto investments & still is my favorite besides BTC  1. Like many in my early crypto days, I was drawn to the price  Plus LTC was a top crypto, like BTC, but faster & 4 x’s as many  It just made sense. If BTC does well, LTC will too
